sectors.1:
Task 1: Locate the hidden tunnel.

Task 2: Find and push movable walls (press E).

Task 3: Break cracked walls to clear the way.

interactables.1:
Task: Find the entrance to the building.
Tip: Stand in the doorway and press E.

weather_meteor.1:
Task: Collect as many fish as possible.
Tip: Fish can only be collected after a meteor hits them.
